text: Bazilije Stjepan Pandžić (30 January 1918 – 16 April 2019) was a Croatian historian, archivist and orientalist.Zvonko Pandžić (priredio/edidit): Stephani Basilii Pandžić, O.F.M. – Opera Omnia Typis Edita. Editio electronico modo confecta. Izdavač: Editiones Tusculanae. Zagreb 2010. He entered the Franciscan Order in 1935 and was became a priest in 1941. From 1947 to 1985, he was the general archivist and analyst of the Franciscan Order in Rome. In 1958, he was named vice-president of the International Association of Church Archives. He turned 100 in January 2018. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Croatian writers Category:Yugoslavian historians Category:Centenarians
